"The affirmation text along with any audio recording will be removed.
"This cannot be reversed.

%1$s, are you sure you want to delete this folder containing %2$s" affirmations?
"This cannot be reversed.

In the simplest sense, affirmations are the words that you say to yourself".
These powerful statements help us control our self-talk and support our growth.
A few examples of positive affirmations are: 1. I am worthy just as I am. 2. I am choosing to feel grateful. 3. I am succeeding in life.
They are an effective tool to treat ourselves with compassion and respect."

"When used consistently and open-mindedly, affirmations help in transitioning our self-talk. Like any other tool, affirmations are most effective when we work with them regularly.
There is "scientific evidence that affirmations lower stress and maintain our sense of self-integrity.

There are 3 main pillars" to this:
"
Focus: Value each word of the affirmation and believe in it. Involve your body by putting your hand on your chest and closing your eyes." "
Repetition: It is recommended to repeat affirmations at least 3 times to imprint it on your mind." "
Consistency: If its in the morning or right before you sleep, choose a time to practice affirmations and stick to it." "
You have reached to the end of this session
Going away from this screen will stop playing the affirmations.
"You can start adding affirmations in the next step."
I love myself and I am perfectly healthy.
A grateful heart lives a happy life 🌈💙
I love myself. I believe in myself. I support myself.
Take a moment to affirm to yourself 😇🌠
I am allowing myself to feel good.
Take a deep breath 🌼 and say…
I am meant to live a happy life.
I am courageous and I stand up for myself.
Every day, I am becoming calmer, more positive, and more confident.
I possess the qualities needed to be extremely successful.
Today I make the most of who I am and what I have to become who I can be.
I am more at ease every day.
Today I will enjoy every moment to the fullest.
Take it one step at a time 🐾

"To take this Challenge, you'll first need to complete or stop the ongoing challenge."
To restart this challenge, please complete or stop your ongoing challenge
To take this challenge, please complete or stop your ongoing challenge
How we’re celebrating World Gratitude Day with this challenge ->
Since 1977, World Gratitude Day has been about spreading the joy of gratitude with everyone.
Thank you letters are a wonderful way to express gratitude to the important people in our lives.
Writing thank you letters is also proven to boost happiness levels and life satisfaction.
This guided challenge will help you be more grateful and appreciate the people who make your life better.
📝 Guidance with prompts, tips, and examples
⏰ Reminders to keep you on track
We’ll notify you on launch day 🔔
Starting on World Gratitude Day, September 21
We’ll notify you on September 21, 8 AM sharp as the challenge goes live.
Invite your friends to join you in this exciting challenge! 💝
Receive latest updates by tapping below 🔔
We’ll notify you on %1$s, 8 AM sharp as the challenge goes live.
We’ll notify you on launch day 🔔
Invite your friends to join you in this exciting challenge. 💝

✨ Honesty, not perfection:" Don’t worry about writing perfect words. Focus on expressing yourself as naturally as you can.
"🤗 Send, don’t overthink:" It can be a daunting exercise to send a gratitude letter but it’s highly encouraged.
As they have done something good for you, they deserve to be appreciated for it.
This not only makes you more humble, but it also helps spread gratitude into that person’s life.
Focus more on why you feel grateful and less on how the other will react.
People always like to be appreciated.
"📷 Use visuals:" To make your letters more expressive use emojis and photos. They really make a letter come alive!
"💌 One person, multiple letters:" If you write letters to the same person more than once during the challenge, it’s okay.
Keep in mind that although the person is same, the reason for the letter is different."

"To ensure your privacy, Gratitude doesn't store any of your data on its own. So, we give you the option to store it safely in your account."
All of your data will be automatically synced to your google drive account.

This will help you get your data back in case you lose your phone, get a new one, or uninstall the app. When you install the app again, you will get the option to restore your data through the backup.
To check your Google Drive backup, open your Google Drive on a laptop or PC, tap on Settings > Manage apps. You will see the Gratitude app there.

Which activity do you enjoy doing the most?

Take a few minutes out to visit your Vision Board today. Believe and achieve!
Download this PDF of your vision board in polaroid format. Ready to print and frame. 🖼️ ✨
"1. What is a vision board? 2. Why Use a Vision Board? 3. How to make it?"

A vision board is a visualization tool." It is a board that has photos and words that represent your goals and dreams. Whatever you want, display it on your board.
This collection of photos serves as your vision for your future. It should represent your dreams, your goals, and your ideal life."

The intention behind creating a vision board is to get a clear picture of what you want to achieve, and then to revisit it daily" to remember and tell yourself that you can achieve it.
As you keep practising this regularly with an open and confident heart, you start to "attract your goals into your life. After all, believing in yourself is one of the most important steps towards achieving your dreams.
Making a vision board is an awesome process where you get to design how you want to shape your life. We’ll help you to choose the kind of photos and words you should use in your board.

Try and find images that speak to your heart and you feel a connection with. Would you like to see yourself living that image? Don’t worry about how likely it is to happen. Would you like it to happen? Select it.
Take some time and think about what you want for your life in the next year, or the next 5 years, it’s up to you.
How to make a Vision Board?
This is what you’ll tell yourself as you look at your board. Be enthusiastic. Be brave. Be ambitious. You have the capacity to achieve your dreams and you must tell yourself that.
Create a Vision Board for your goals!
You can do anything you set your mind to!
